Name: Hunted: Kalevala
About the game: Story You are a hunter gatherer, Finnish man coming back from the woods. You will find your family butchered by something sinister... Time to find that beast, and kill it. Perkele. Features - First person exploration - Hunting - Finnish mythology settings. - Atmospheric - Stealth - Boss Credits Hunted: Kalevala is made by 3rd year game production students at JAMK, Business Information Technology. Jyväskylä Finland. Game was made over approximately 4 months, with a lot of hiccups and problems on the way. With no Unreal Engine experience before this project. Juho Harju / Project Lead / Product Owner/ Design / Environment / Steam Publishing / Evgenii Vetoshkin / Programmer / UI Implementation / Ilia Rozhnov / 3D Models / Animation Ilona Vertanen / Scrum Master / Unreal Engine / Environment Tero Korpela / Git / Server Mehmet Eralp / UI Art Jaakko Kuorikoski / Audio Recording Music: Olga Kolari / Sonic Poetry: composition, recording, traditional Finnish musical instrument, keyboard, design. Henry Kolari / Art of Sound: Mix and Mastering Katri Laulainen: Shaman drums and Singing Juha Jyrkäs: Throat Singing SPECIAL THANKS TO OUR MENTORS Peter Ciszek Masa Gorse
